synopsis.text: Miku's husband, once the most feared yakuza known as 'the Immortal Dragon,' has traded his dangerous lifestyle for the comfort of domesticity. This legendary gangster, who was once the center of countless underworld tales, has now become an everyday househusband. With his apron on, he tackles mundane household tasks with the same intensity he once used to face rival gangs. From cooking up a storm in the kitchen to hunting for the best deals at the supermarket, Tatsu is determined to excel in his new role. However, his unusual past often intertwines with his present, leading to unexpected encounters with former subordinates and enemies. Join Tatsu in this unique blend of cozy domestic comedy and yakuza thriller, as he navigates through his new life, one grocery run at a time.
